reviewText: One of the best Mandolinist showing some of the greatest arpeggios.  Learn from the master.
Mike Marshall is a tremendous teacher.  Great addition to anyone's musical journey into mandolin studies.
Great learning DVD, good practical advice and lessons.
Mike moves too fast for this beginner!  For me this was a huge waste of money.
Great help of r my mandolin playing.

This will take your fretboard knowledge and improving skills to new vistas. Mike even has a couple of buds that help make the live backtracks!
Definitely check out his chord video in addition.
This is as close to playing with Mike Marshall that we mortals are allowed unless we're Lucky enough to take lessons with him.
Mike Marshall's workout is a must for every mandolin player.  He always gives you tips and tricks that really help you out.  Great fun.
I like Mike Marshall. He reminds me of a friend I play with and he's got good tips on how to play better.
You must have it ! A great Dvd to study , as the otehr Mike's Dvd and books, really good. Mike is the best mandolin teacher I know and he is the best mandolin player I know, too
Of all the DVD's out there about learning to play the mandolin, Mike Marshall's are the BEST by far. He doesn't teach you to play individual songs as much as he teaches you how to play the mandolin.
